posts.post_title: FS/FT-T206 Larry Doyle Portrait Piedmont 350-460/25 SGC 5.5
posts.post_content:
Price reduction Apologies for pix-Can send additional scans upon request via [url]edobrown@verizon.net[/url]


Doyle-Great focus, nice centering and really clean surfaces. Only 2 graded higher on PSA POP Report for a comparison of a fairly scarce variation

$300 delivered  via Paypal FF,  Earliest timestamps on PMs or this thread of "Sold" take precedence.



Will consider trades for PSA graded OM SL's of PSA 4.5 or better. Can add cash w/any offers

Thanks Wayne
